name: Tropius

attacks.name: Sunbathe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, generate a Fire Energy and attach it to Tropius.

attacks.name: Harvest
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Tropius. If you do, you may search your discard for a Berry and attach it to Tropius, or put it in your hand.

attacks.name: Solar Beam
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Tropius to use this attack.

flavor: These Pokemon grow long necks to soak in solar rays. Their unique skeletal structure lets them sleep with their heads high in the sky.
